ygData.subject: Re: Books
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, unlike the other classes, the runes are unique to the Wizard class.  No other class can use them ;) Talarin Kal Amon. High Elven Wizard ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, unlike the other classes, the runes are unique to the Wizard
class. No other class can use them ;)

Talarin Kal'Amon. High Elven Wizard


----- Original Message -----
From: <TkAdam@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 7:19 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Books


> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 5/6/99 9:59:50 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
sdunn@...
> writes:
>
> > From: sdunn@...
> >
> > So far I've bought all of the wizard series of research books and
> translated
> > them. I only counted about 25 or so spells in them. All of them are in
> Old
> > Erudian.
> >
> > I know there has to be more, I have a rune right now that doesn't seem
to
> go
> > with any of the spells lists I've been given.
>
> Well, other classes will sue runes you do not. Meaning, one of the other
> calsses may need it :)
>
> > Plus according to the book, On
> > Languages, there are books writen in Combine, Dragon and Elder Dragon.
> >
> > Anyone know where to find these?
>
> Not exactly... but probably NOT in any guild. I have heard of finding
spells
> in weird places, and such as Ocean of tears. So I expect spell research
> books will be scattered about.
>
> You are lucky... I am a necro, my first book is in Elder elvish... the
three
> other books I have found are in another language (I am guessing it will be
> Elder Tir'Dal)
>
> Sonoroud Tomebinder.
>
